Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
10.07.2013 SH SCR18237 BPH402B Added BPH104.PI.IBANDEBTOR and BPH104.PI.SWIFTDEBTOR
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
09.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Added BPH104.PI.BANK_ADMNO = DRFT_BANK_ADMNO
04.05.2011 JOH SCR16385 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
21.01.2011 GB SCR16161 Changed condition for parts BPH402B3, BPH402B4
15.12.2010 SH SCR16057 Added module BPH402B1
17.08.2010 SH SCR15725 BPH402B2/B4 Added BPH104.PO.SFIP_NO and call of BSF106
25.08.2009 SH SCR14729 Added BPH104.PI.TESTBANKACCOUNT= 'N'
09.07.2008 SH SCR13769 BPH420B3 Added test on CLNT212_INTERCREDIT = Y to
book payments automatically; BPH420B2 Module is skipped now for confidential / intercredit clients
05.11.2007 SH SCR13034 BPH402B2 Added BPH104.PI.WKAACCOUNT = N
22.06.2007 SH SCR12638 BPH402B5 Removed call of GB430 and updates of BPIV rows
02.04.2007 SH SCR12416 Set Share = Read to Write for table CLNT
16.05.2006 JJ SCR11234 Added skipped parameter to GB430 call
24.03.2006 SH SCR10350 Fixed problems with auto. batches, see SCR for details
17.02.2006 SH SCR10355 Removed module BPH402B, incl BPH402B1 (Handle intercredit
now always the BPH402B module without BPH402B1 module is called, see SCR8237
09.02.2006 SH SCR10350 BPH402B Changed selection of DRAFT to store one single
batch for every distinct in DRFT_ADMNO, DRFT_CLNTNO, DRFT_BANK_ADMNO,
DRFT_BANK_LEDG_NO, done in both versions of BPH402B, see SCR 8237
29.12.2005 SH SCR9935 BPH402B4 Added DEBC_LEGALCOLLECTION <> 'Y' to condition to perfrom module
08.12.2005 SH SCR9719 Fixed parameter mismatch inargument list for GB430
02.11.2005 SH SCR9140 Changed booking part for manual batches in case of confidential cilents
14.10.2005 AK SCR9140 add automatic booking amounts draft -
implemented in both PBH402B programs
26.07.2005 AK SCR8933 changed parameter PI.DEBH_NO to DRFT_DEBH_NO when
calling BPH105 implemented in both PBH402B programs
26.07.2005 SH SCR8547 Added new arguments to list for BPH102, both skipped
13.07.2005 SH SCR8473 BPH402B Added new arguments for BPH104 and BPH106
12.07.2005 SH SCR8544 BPH402B1 Added new arguments to call of BPH112
03.05.2005 SH SCR8237 Made copy of BPH402B, where the hole intercredit
handling is removed (= BPH402B1). Ony this copy is called for the moment.
Be carefull with program changes according to BPH402B programs, has to be done
maybe twice in both tasks.
-- Check if drafts exists which have to be handled
-- No DRFT rows exist which have to be handeld
-- DRFT rows exists for further handling
Get Miscellaneous debtor number for confidential client
(in factorlink we do not registered debtors for confidential clients)AK SCR9284
-- Used for BPH402B1
-- Used for BPH402B2
-- Used for BPH402B3 and BPH402B4
-- Set variables
-- Reset variables
BPH402B - Set to 0 to force the creation of a new batch for every ledger number
-- Uses at the end of DRF_BANK_LEDG_NO level, to check if it's possible to
start BPH250 for intercredit/confidential clients and maual batches or
auto. batches
BPH402B1 - Handle intercredit
Start BPH250 for drafts for intercredit/confidential clients where manual
payments were created with module BPH402B3
Start BPH250 for automatic payments
BPH402B1 - Handle intercredit
BPH242B2 - Check if automatic payment handling possible
... reset output variables of BPH104
BPH402B2 - Automatic payment handling
BPH402B3 - Store manual payment
Call BPH402B5 - Store automatic booking amounts draft
BPH402B4 - Automatic payment handling
BPH402C - Final updates at draft level
-- Final bookings if BATCH_PAYMENT_CLIENT / INVOICE are handled
